Title: In Need of Primal Foci
CompletionText:
The major factions of the Dragon Isles are looking to upgrade the gear of their warriors. 

Do you happen to have any Primal Foci you would be willing to donate to this effort? The faction you donate to is sure to take note.
RewardText:
Thank you!

Tell me which major faction you would like to donate these to, and I will make sure they hear about your generosity.
